019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import java.io.File;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.io.InputStream;
024import java.nio.file.Files;
025import java.util.logging.Level;
026import java.util.logging.LogManager;
027import java.util.logging.Logger;
028import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
029import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLineParser;
030import org.apache.commons.cli.DefaultParser;
031import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
032import org.apache.commons.cli.Options;
033import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_NAME;
034import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.FsdUtils;
035import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
036import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
037import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
038import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
039import org.jgrapes.core.events.Stop;
040import org.jgrapes.io.NioDispatcher;
041import org.jgrapes.util.FileSystemWatcher;
042import org.jgrapes.util.YamlConfigurationStore;
043import org.jgrapes.util.events.WatchFile;
044
045/**
046 * The application class.
047 */
048public class Operator extends Component {
049
050    private static Operator app;
051
052    /**
053     * Instantiates a new manager.
054     * @param cmdLine 
055     *
056     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
057     */
058    public Operator(CommandLine cmdLine) throws IOException {
059        // Prepare component tree
060        attach(new NioDispatcher());
061        attach(new FileSystemWatcher(channel()));
062        attach(new Controller(channel()));
063
064        // Configuration store with file in /etc/opt (default)
065        File config = new File(cmdLine.getOptionValue('c',
066            "/etc/opt/" + VM_OP_NAME + "/config.yaml"));
067        // Don't rely on night config to produce a good exception
068        // for this simple case
069        if (!Files.isReadable(config.toPath())) {
070            throw new IOException("Cannot read configuration file " + config);
071        }
072        attach(new YamlConfigurationStore(channel(), config, false));
073        fire(new WatchFile(config.toPath()));
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * On stop.
078     *
079     * @param event the event
080     */
081    @Handler(priority = -1000)
082    public void onStop(Stop event) {
083        logger.fine(() -> "Applictaion stopped.");
084    }
085
086    static {
087        try {
088            InputStream props;
089            var path = FsdUtils.findConfigFile(Constants.APP_NAME,
090                "logging.properties");
091            if (path.isPresent()) {
092                props = Files.newInputStream(path.get());
093            } else {
094                props
095                    = Operator.class.getResourceAsStream("logging.properties");
096            }
097            LogManager.getLogManager().readConfiguration(props);
098        } catch (IOException e) {
099            e.printStackTrace(); // NOPMD
100        }
101    }
102
103    /**
104     * The main method.
105     *
106     * @param args the arguments
107     * @throws Exception the exception
108     */
109    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
110    public static void main(String[] args) {
111        try {
112            Logger.getLogger(Operator.class.getName())
113                .fine(() -> "Version: "
114                    + Operator.class.getPackage().getImplementationVersion());
115            CommandLineParser parser = new DefaultParser();
116            // parse the command line arguments
117            final Options options = new Options();
118            options.addOption(new Option("c", "config", true, "The configura"
119                + "tion file (defaults to /etc/opt/vmoperator/config.yaml)."));
120            CommandLine cmd = parser.parse(options, args);
121            // The Operator is the root component
122            app = new Operator(cmd);
123
124            // Prepare Stop
125            Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(() -> {
126                try {
127                    app.fire(new Stop(), Channel.BROADCAST);
128                    Components.awaitExhaustion();
129                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
130                    // Cannot do anything about this.
131                }
132            }));
133
134            // Start application
135            Components.start(app);
136        } catch (IOException | InterruptedException
137                | org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException e) {
138            Logger.getLogger(Operator.class.getName()).log(Level.SEVERE, e,
139                () -> "Failed to start runner: " + e.getMessage());
140        }
141    }
142
143}
